issue.message: Lint issue IDs should be reasonably short (< 40 chars); they're used in suppress annotations etc
Lint issue IDs should be reasonably short (< 40 chars); they're used in suppress annotations etc
The issue summary should *not* end with a period (think of it as a headline)
The issue summary should be shorter; typically just a 3-6 words; it's used as a topic header in HTML reports and in the IDE inspections window

issue.message: No need to call `.trimIndent()` in issue registration strings; they are already trimmed by indent by lint when displaying to users. Instead, call `.indented()` on the surrounding `kotlin()` test file construction
